sense.def:
A tribute
so besede ali dejanja, s katerimi želimo pokazati svoje občudovanje in spoštovanje nekoga.

seg.quote: Asquith paid tribute to his personal qualities.

sense.def:
Kadar je ena stvar
a tribute to another thing
, je rezultat druge in dokazuje njeno kakovost.

seg.quote: The fact that I survived is a tribute to the indestructibility of the human body.
